title: ????? RIOT WTF
body:
Hello,

This account is from Season 3 and i forgot my email adress but i still could play on it,
after i ask hey riot can u help me change it?
now my account is suspended when i just bought 50 euro's off rp and why should i even buy rp on a acc that isnt mine

replies.body: I looked into this for you, and it seems that a protective lock was placed on it due to suspicious activity.  Unless you already have a ticket open, fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) so our account team can help get this back in your hands!
